name: BIRD GAM
description:
hey you, yea you

DO YOU FUCKING LOVE BIRDS

LIKE DO YOU GET A KIRA YOSHIKAGE LEVEL ERECTION WHEN YOU SEE A FEATHERED MEATY CREATURE

WELL THIS GAME IS FOR YOU

YOU GET TO BE A BIRD

FUCK OTHER BIRDS

KILL PEOPLE

BECOME MURDER

BIRRD

YOU CAN EVEN UNLOCK... HIDDEN BIRDS!!!

HOOOLY SHIIIT

(bird gam was a  JOKEtest flappy bird remake for my first time using godot engine)
